text: 17:8 Aposel 7:5Ezɨ Kenanɨn nguazir nɨ datɨrɨghɨn puram aperaghav itir kam, kar igharaz darazir nguazim. Eghtɨ kɨ nɨ ko nɨn ovavir borir gɨn otivamiba, kɨ Kenanɨn nguaziba bar da isɨ, ia danɨngam. Eghtɨ nguazir kam, a ian nguazimɨn ikɨ mamaghɨra ikiam. Eghtɨ kɨ nɨn ovavir boribar Godɨn ikiam.”
